choose.when: FID, FORG_TYPE, FORG_CODE, FORG_NAME, FPARENT_CODE, FINCEPT_TIME, FEXPIRY_TIME, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FORDER, FLVALUE, FRVALUE, FLEVEL, FSUBNUM, FCHARACTER, FVALIDATE_CODE, FLINKMAN, FTELEPHONE, FFAX, FEMAIL, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK

mapper.select:
select
from ect_org
order by
${item.field}
desc
mapper.delete: delete from ect_org where FID in (#{listItem})
mapper.insert: insert into ect_org (FID, FORG_TYPE, FORG_CODE, FORG_NAME, FPARENT_CODE, FINCEPT_TIME, FEXPIRY_TIME, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FORDER, FLVALUE, FRVALUE, FLEVEL, FSUBNUM, FCHARACTER, FVALIDATE_CODE, FLINKMAN, FTELEPHONE, FFAX, FEMAIL, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK ) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inceptTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expiryTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{character, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validateCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update ect_org

where FID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

FORG_TYPE = #{orgType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORG_CODE = #{orgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORG_NAME = #{orgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPARENT_CODE = #{parentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINCEPT_TIME = #{inceptTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEXPIRY_TIME = #{expiryTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FENABLE = #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, FAUDIT_STATE = #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FDELETE_STATE = #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FEDIT_STATE = #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FORDER = #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLVALUE = #{lvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FRVALUE = #{rvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLEVEL = #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FSUBNUM = #{subnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FCHARACTER = #{character, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FVALIDATE_CODE = #{validateCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMAN = #{linkman, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FTELEPHONE = #{telephone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFAX = #{fax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEMAIL = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAUDITOR_ID = #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATOR_ID = #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCREATE_TIME = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FDELETOR_ID = #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEDITOR_ID = #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEDIT_TIME = #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FREMARK = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
